p: Laboratories consume significant amounts of energy, water, and other resources. The Laboratory Efficiency Assessment Framework (LEAF) and My Green Laboratory platforms offer evidence-based guidance and online frameworks for laboratory personnel and researchers to implement actions that limit waste and reduce the carbon footprint of laboratory work, such as switching ultra-low temperature freezers from –80 to –70°C.24–26 It is estimated that the LEAF platform saves on average the equivalent of 2.9 tons of CO2 per laboratory per year.27
